DOC.brief_summary: A brief treatment program ( MI/CBT ) via face-to-face via internet test association outpatient addiction clinic .
DOC.brief_title: Internet-based vs Face-to-face Treatment Alcohol Dependence
DOC.detailed_description: A 5-module program base motivational interviewing ( MI ) cognitive behavioral therapy ( CBT ) test among help-seekers one outpatient clinic within Stockholm Center Dependency Disorders : Riddargatan 1.The design two-armed randomize control non-inferiority study , outcomes measure term change alcohol consumption , problematic alcohol use , alcohol dependence alcohol use disorder , anxiety , well depression quality life . 600 participant recruit online clinic 's website . Consenting participant complete baseline questionnaire online participate face-to-face assessment physician clinic . Eligible individual randomize one two group : 1.Internet-based treatment program online counselor support . 2 . Face-to-face treatment 5 individual counselor session clinic . Follow-up conduct online 3 , 6 , 12 24 month group .
